function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Implement waste reduction strategies and enhance waste management infrastructure","category":"Absorb resource shortages","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement safety measures in recycling centers and promote alternative recycling methods","category":"Selection of materials","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of safe waste handling protocols and specialized waste treatment for contaminated materials","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of quality","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Keep smart home systems well-maintained and limit unnecessary use","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Diversify network access and consider backup solutions","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improve ventilation and air quality monitoring","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote ventilation and air circulation within the living spaces, encourage the use of outdoor spaces when possible, and practice good hygiene and sanitation measures.","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct comprehensive scientific research on the health effects of 5g technologies, implement regulations and guidelines to limit exposure levels, and educate the public on potential risks and safety measures.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of innovative materials with reduced voc emissions and eco-friendly treatments","category":"Selection of materials","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of surfaces, use of materials with anti-viral properties","category":"Cleaning technologies (robots)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Regular and constant disinfection of spaces, especially frequently touched surfaces","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Providing adequate space, terraces, and gardens, and addressing overcrowding and quality of dwellings","category":"Greenery","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Update the previous ministerial decree and integrate regulations into a single national legislation","category":"Facilitate upskilling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide standardized guidelines and training for designers and builders to prioritize health in design solutions","category":"Staff training /
